nodes.text: Mennar-Daye was a location where the Rebel Alliance had a base in the cave systems. Sometime during the Galactic Civil War, the Galactic Empire's 204th Imperial Fighter Wing fought the rebels at some point prior to the Battle of Endor, which occurred in 4 ABY. Imperial bombers had made runs over the cave systems for days. It later came to have a New Republic presence. The starship Yissira Zyde traveled to the commerce center on Mennar-Daye, where it was screened by Republic authorities.
